=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/08/15 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Danny DeVito'], 'Producers': ['Andrew Lazar', 'Peter Macgregor-Scott'], 'Starring': ['Robin Williams', 'Edward Norton', 'Catherine Keener'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']} Review Text: Wife decided we had to watch this movie ASAP, so we bought the streaming version. Wish there was a BluRay version at a reasonable price, but I guess we'll be able to watch this again as long as it's available online.

Great movie. It's a classic - Norton is fantastic, and Williams is an absolute gem. Review Title: Wish there was a BluRay Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
The Fifth Element (Remastered) [Blu-ray] Bruce Willis (Actor), Gary Oldman (Actor), Luc Besson (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: Blu-ray Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Action & Adventure ['Product Description', "New York cab driver Korben Dallas didn't mean to be a hero, but he just picked up the kind of fare that only comes along every five thousand years: A perfect beauty, a perfect being, a perfect weapon. Together, they must save the world. Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world. Now presented in full 4K resolution, experience this dynamic action favorite like never before.", 'Amazon.com', "Ancient curses, all-powerful monsters, shape-changing assassins, scantily-clad stewardesses, laser battles, huge explosions, a perfect woman, a malcontent hero--what more can you ask of a big-budget science fiction movie? Luc Besson's high-octane film incorporates presidents, rock stars, and cab drivers into its peculiar plot, traversing worlds and encountering some pretty wild aliens. Bruce Willis stars as a down-and-out cabbie who must win the love of Leeloo (Milla Jovovich) to save Earth from destruction by Jean-Baptiste Emmanuel Zorg (Gary Oldman) and a dark, unearthly force that makes Darth Vader look like an Ewok.", '--Geoff Riley'] {'Genre': 'Action, Sci-Fi', 'Format': 'Blu-ray, Subtitled, Dolby, Color, Widescreen, Anamorphic', 'Contributor': 'Gary Oldman, Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, Luc Besson, Ian Holm, Chris Tucker', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), French (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 6 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '6.75 x 5.25 x 0.3 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3350191', 'Director': 'Luc Besson', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray, Subtitled, Dolby, Color, Widescreen, Anamorphic', 'Run time': '2 hours and 6 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 17, 2007', 'Actors': 'Bruce Willis, Gary Oldman, Ian Holm, Milla Jovovich, Chris Tucker', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Thai, Mandarin Chinese', 'Studio': 'Sony Pictures', 'Number of discs': '1'} Looks and sounds AMAZING. Best experience with this movie I've ever had. Seriously a well done remaster. Looks and sounds AMAZING. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Interests:** The user maintains a strong enthusiasm for movies, particularly in the action and sci-fi genres, and has a deep appreciation for high-quality TV series with rich narratives. Nostalgic comedies continue to resonate, reflecting a connection to childhood memories.

- **Media Format Preference:** The user shows a clear preference for Blu-ray and high-quality remasterings but is willing to settle for streaming options when Blu-ray isn't available at a reasonable price, indicating a commitment to superior viewing experiences.

- **Rating Trends:** The user's average rating remains high (4.8), with a recent perfect score of 5.0 emphasizing their preference for exceptional storytelling and production quality. Their consistent ratings indicate a discerning taste for media that delivers on all fronts.

- **Favorite Themes:** Unique storytelling infused with adventure and fantastical elements, combined with nostalgic and humorous narratives, continues to be a significant draw for the user.

- **Director and Actor Appreciation:** While they favor directors and actors like Luc Besson and Bruce Willis, the recent interest in performances by Robin Williams and Edward Norton showcases an expanding appreciation for diverse talents that contribute to compelling storytelling.

- **Review Behavior:** The user actively shares positive, detailed feedback, focusing on emotional and sensory impacts. Their willingness to express preferences regarding format options reflects an evolving engagement with media, always seeking innovative content with high production values that could become cult classics.
